longDescription:
Get documents signed quickly and easily with the world's #1 e-signature solution. Docusign for Microsoft teams brings all of your important Docusign notifications to your Microsoft Teams account and lets you send an envelope, use a template, and manage your envelopes without leaving Microsoft Teams. 
Docusign for Microsoft Teams requires a Docusign license. [Try Docusign free for 30 days.](https://trial.docusign.com/) 
Key capabilities for Docusign on Microsoft Teams: 
* Send and sign documents on practically any device, from almost anywhere, at any time. 
* Access a library of templates to quickly generate agreements. 
* Get notifications and automatic reminders when you need to sign. 
* Get notifications when someone completes an agreement. 
* Get peace of mind as Docusign automatically generates and stores a robust audit trail for every agreement. 
* Access your agreements quickly from the Manage tab. 
Learn More: 
* [Docusign and Microsoft](https://www.docusign.com/integrations/microsoft) 
* [Collaborate faster with Docusign and Microsoft Teams](https://www.docusign.com/blog/esignature-microsoft-teams) 
* [Get Started](https://support.docusign.com/s/document-item?rsc_301=&bundleId=pkq1613692267541&topicId=kut1613692625739.html) 
* [Contact Support](https://support.docusign.com/s/contactSupport?_gl=1*1rkm9ec*_gcl_aw*R0NMLjE2ODczOTE3MzQuQ2p3S0NBand2OHFrQmhBbkVpd0FrWS1haGgyUHFhX3FWUWhDVFpSX0hPR3BqeV9RQWgwTXlBQVlpbkV6Z1QtU2pJVGhTMjRZUXRVYVBSb0N4SzBRQXZEX0J3RQ..*_gcl_au*MTk3ODc0ODcwNC4xNjg1NDc0NjU3*_ga*NzAzODYzMTg5LjE2MTgyNTIwODg.*_ga_1TZ7S9D6BQ*MTY4OTI3MTU0MS4xMDI4LjEuMTY4OTI3MjczNC41My4wLjA.&_ga=2.224582042.1615391534.1688873760-703863189.1618252088&_gac=1.225192424.1687391736.CjwKCAjwv8qkBhAnEiwAkY-ahh2Pqa_qVQhCTZR_HOGpjy_QAh0MyAAYinEzgT-SjIThS24YQtUaPRoCxK0QAvD_BwE)

commands.title: Sign With Docusign

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Get documents signed quickly and easily with the world's #1 e-signature solution. Docusign for Microsoft teams brings all of your important Docusign notifications to your Microsoft Teams account and lets you send an envelope, use a template, and manage your envelopes without leaving Microsoft Teams. 
Docusign for Microsoft Teams requires a Docusign license. [Try Docusign free for 30 days.](https://trial.docusign.com/) 
Key capabilities for Docusign on Microsoft Teams: 
* Send and sign documents on practically any device, from almost anywhere, at any time. 
* Access a library of templates to quickly generate agreements. 
* Get notifications and automatic reminders when you need to sign. 
* Get notifications when someone completes an agreement. 
* Get peace of mind as Docusign automatically generates and stores a robust audit trail for every agreement. 
* Access your agreements quickly from the Manage tab. 
Learn More: 
* [Docusign and Microsoft](https://www.docusign.com/integrations/microsoft) 
* [Collaborate faster with Docusign and Microsoft Teams](https://www.docusign.com/blog/esignature-microsoft-teams) 
* [Get Started](https://support.docusign.com/s/document-item?rsc_301=&bundleId=pkq1613692267541&topicId=kut1613692625739.html) 
* [Contact Support](https://support.docusign.com/s/contactSupport?_gl=1*1rkm9ec*_gcl_aw*R0NMLjE2ODczOTE3MzQuQ2p3S0NBand2OHFrQmhBbkVpd0FrWS1haGgyUHFhX3FWUWhDVFpSX0hPR3BqeV9RQWgwTXlBQVlpbkV6Z1QtU2pJVGhTMjRZUXRVYVBSb0N4SzBRQXZEX0J3RQ..*_gcl_au*MTk3ODc0ODcwNC4xNjg1NDc0NjU3*_ga*NzAzODYzMTg5LjE2MTgyNTIwODg.*_ga_1TZ7S9D6BQ*MTY4OTI3MTU0MS4xMDI4LjEuMTY4OTI3MjczNC41My4wLjA.&_ga=2.224582042.1615391534.1688873760-703863189.1618252088&_gac=1.225192424.1687391736.CjwKCAjwv8qkBhAnEiwAkY-ahh2Pqa_qVQhCTZR_HOGpjy_QAh0MyAAYinEzgT-SjIThS24YQtUaPRoCxK0QAvD_BwE)

The user wants to send a document for signing using Docusign.
The user is attempting to log into their Docusign account to manage documents or signatures.
